title: Reckless Putin will not intimidate us - Biden
description: The US president condemns Russia's leader over his declared annexation of four occupied regions of Ukraine.

title: Putin raises stakes in speech full of anti-Western bile
description: This is an attempt to divert from Russia's problems on the battlefield, says the BBC's Steve Rosenberg.

title: Ian batters South Carolina in second US landfall
description: After wreaking deadly havoc in Florida, Ian smashes piers in South Carolina and floods neighbourhoods.

title: Why India's abortion ruling is a huge step forward
description: Unlike the Roe v Wade ruling in the US, Indian top court's order is being hailed as hugely progressive.

title: An Indian maharaja and a 'mystery' will
description: A ruling by India's Supreme Court has ended a three-decade-long royal feud that involved a "fake" will.

title: Birth control scandal of Greenland's young women
description: Denmark and Greenland agree to investigate traumatising birth control procedures on Inuit Greenlanders.

title: Military officers remove Burkina Faso leader
description: An army captain has announced the removal of the country's military leader Lt Col Paul-Henri Damiba.

title: Roblox removes 'meat grinder' Ukraine war game
description: The War on Larkiv game was accepted and promoted by the world's largest children's game platform.

title: Kabul blast kills teenagers sitting practice exam
description: The suspected suicide bombing in the Afghan capital targeted students at a tuition centre.

title: 'Nine Europeans' arrested over Iran protests
description: Germany, France, the UK and Sweden have been warned over the involvement of their "agents", Iran says.

title: 'Nine Europeans' arrested over Iran protests
description: Germany, France, the UK and Sweden have been warned over the involvement of their "agents", Iran says.

title: Messages reveal how Musk and Twitter boss fell out
description: New text messages between Musk and Twitter boss Parag Agrawal reveal how the relationship broke down.

title: Messages reveal how Musk and Twitter boss fell out
description: New text messages between Musk and Twitter boss Parag Agrawal reveal how the relationship broke down.

title: Thai court rules coup leader can remain PM
description: A challenge to Prayuth Chan-ocha's term limits is rejected but he fails to secure his preferred outcome.

title: UK PM admits disruption after tax cut pledges
description: The prime minister acknowledges her economic plans will "involve disruption in the short term".

title: Prince's online safety call after girl's death
description: Prince William says online safety for young people should be "prerequisite, not an afterthought".
